Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: ER6N
Reviews.Content: I love this television!  I can't believe that the only other smart TV of the same size is over $100 more expensive.  I bought this TV to use in my garage.  I don't have cable or satellite connection there so I really wanted a smart TV so I could watch Netflix, Vudu, YouTube, and listen to music while I'm working.  The TV connected to my wireless router with no problem and the picture on Netflix and Vudu look excellent!  There are also radio apps like Pandora and a Philips radio app that let's you listed to stations from all around the world.  I connected an old non-amplified indoor antenna and was able to pick up many of the local broadcast digital channels.  I'm going to try a newer antenna and see what happens.  I wasn't expecting to get much over-the-air so I was surprised.

Reviews.Title: The 22 model does NOT have MediaConnect
Reviews.Author: SEG
Reviews.Content: It's a fine TV. However, be warned that the 22" model does NOT include the MediaConnect feature--contrary to the claim of the Amazon web page.

Reviews.Title: Met my needs, expectations & price
Reviews.Author: AverageJoe
Reviews.Content: I was looking to replace the bargin 15" LCD that I had in my woodshop to keep up on the games during breaks, or when I'm just hanging out in it. I needed one much brighter, better viewing angle and at least decent sound. I only had a limited shelf space for it so 22" was the absolute max. Wifi with a netflix/radio app would be great too. I vowed not to pay more than $200 for it.So this little Philips comes out in Spring, but I waited until a few reviews showed up and the price dropped to <$200. I finally got it in Aug from Walmart.com, delivered to the local store (so I could take it back easily).It's just right. Very bright and non-reflective (it needs to be because shop is well lit), good color and sound, viewing angle is good and the wifi apps work smooth. I tried the USB port for pics and video to make sure it worked, but I don't use that feature. There's a little lag on button presses on the remote, but it's a small thing to me. It's really only used a few hours on the weekends, and maybe an hour during the week, so if it has a reliability issue it might take awhile before I encounter it.I think this TV would do fine in a kitchen or a guest bedroom. When our old CRT TV finally goes in our exercise room, I'll probable get this 22" Philips or it's bigger 26" brother, to replace it.

Reviews.Title: excellent nettv, 22" DOES NOT have mediaconnect feature!
Reviews.Author: WarrenH
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as a replacement for a old 19 CRT which died and I also needed to use to view my computer's screen, however on receiving this item the mediaconnect feature was not available for this model to my disappointment. I like the features and the quality out the box, actually wish I got the bigger 26' version for 70USD more.Overall I am happy with the quality, disappointed with the misleading info on the site and wish I upgraded to the 26" or 32"

Reviews.Title: Misleading description
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Amazon should have updated their description by now. The 22 inch version does not have media connect. Only the 26 and 32 inch models do. In addition, Amazon sent me one that had been previously used and returned. It was very poorly packaged. No more electronics purchases from Amazon for me.

Reviews.Title: Complete junk! Phillips poor customer Service
Reviews.Author: Kanitra Brooks
Reviews.Content: I was thrilled to received the unit. It worked well and helped  free up the family computer. Imagine my surprise when after only 3 months it stopped working. I didn't panic, I called Phillips the next day regarding warranty replacement options. They asked very few questions (apparently this happens all the time) and agreed to and a new unit out if I faxed in my receipt. I followed the agents instructions to the letter. When I did not hear from the company as promised I made a follow up call a few days later. They requested I send another variation of my amazon receipt .......then another, and another. I beginning to wonder if they are stalling. I'm feel like I paid good money to rent a television for 3 months

Reviews.Title: The USB wifi adapter weak.
Reviews.Author: Oiburm
Reviews.Content: Nice picture! gave this as a gift for my niece. Found out the wifi catcher was weak so a network cable had to be used. Its okay.

Reviews.Title: Uncertain of problems
Reviews.Author: Miriam L. Emerson
Reviews.Content: Received box via UPS.  Packaging was in disrepair.  Tape had been taped, retaped and retaped and still falling apart.  TV appeared to be OK until I connected it.  Horrible picture - horrible color - huge disappointment.  Description stated that it was "internet compatible" - talked to Philips tech and he said that ONLY 26" and up were "internet compatible".  I suggested that they change their online description.AMAZON provided easy and comfortable RETURN for me and immediately credited my account.  I think that IF Amazon had packaged and shipped this TV, it would have been in good condition.  I would have still been disappointed that it was NOT "internet compatible" but I think the quality of the picture and color would be much better.BE CAREFUL about product description.  Still don't know how to find truthful description of online products.

Reviews.Title: NO Media Connect
Reviews.Author: cwresor
Reviews.Content: The 22 inch TV does NOT have "MediaConnect"! You must buy the 26 or 32 inch model to get MediaConnect. Evidently Amazon has known this since at least October - but keeps advertising it as having MediaConnect anyway. (I bought the 22 inch model directly from Amazon, not 3rd party seller). I just talked to Amazon on the phone and they don't really care that they have been falsely advertising this product for MONTHS!

Reviews.Title: Good Picture, Bad Parental Controls.
Reviews.Author: Glancyguy
Reviews.Content: The pros:It has a really great picture and easy to use interface.The cons:Terrible at parental controls. I could not deactivate YouTube no matter how many times I tried. Not a kid friendly device for parents that want to monitor what their kids watch.

Reviews.Title: Great ...while it lasted.
Reviews.Author: Antoinette
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv from amazon.com on 8/8/2012 and it died 10/28/2013 in the middle of a show I was viewing.  It had a warranty of one year only so I am out of luck, sadly.  The purchase price was $226.  Beautiful picture and used it in my kitchen for watching news broadcasts primarily. Will not buy another Philips television after this experience.

Reviews.Title: TV died at 14 months.
Reviews.Author: Green Garloo
Reviews.Content: Power button stopped working on remote after about 6 months and TV died exactly at 14 months from purchase.  Warranty is one year.  Not happy at all with the poor quality Philips made here.  I've had Philips TV's in the past and they always had great pictures and lasted a long time. This TV had a great picture too....while it lasted. After this experience, this will be my last Philips TV.

Reviews.Title: The WORST TV that I buy.
Reviews.Author: Jorge Daniel Febres Cordero
Reviews.Content: 1. The TV just worked 1 MONTH.2. The Philips -after sales service- its AWFUL.3. When Philips send me the replacement unit, they NEVER send me an e-mail confirmation or tracking number.4. The wireless feature don't work with Apple Airport. Be careful.From now on, I will only buy Panasonics TV URGENT UPDATE:The second unit (the warranty replacement unit) that Philips send me months ago, STOP working on saturday October 26th 2013 !!!PLEASE do not buy Philips TVs.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV or computer monitor
Reviews.Author: Hugo M. M. Rabson
Reviews.Content: This works beautifully with a cable decoder box or a Mac Mini computer. In either case, the picture is gorgeous.

Reviews.Title: Philips 22PFL4907 22-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Warren Mills
Reviews.Content: As advertised.  This unit works extremely well.  I have it wall mounted in my master bathroom with only the RCA ANT 1650 Flat Digital Amplified Antenna.  It picks up approximately 15 local channels and the picture quality is superb.  It also is picks up my wireless internet signal so I am able to stream Netflix and other movie channels at no additional cost.  I would definitely recommend this product.  I have had it approximately 1 month and have had no issues.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: BT
Reviews.Content: Overall very happy with this TV.  The picture and sound are very good.  My only issue is the base fir it is very flimsy, guess they really expect it to be mounted on a wall.  For the price it was a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Philips 22PFL4907 22-Inch 60Hz LED-Lit TV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Charles Hitchcock
Reviews.Content: This TV is great & my daughter loves it. It has a great picture on it, & it's a nice looking tv.

Reviews.Title: "Smart"est thing I ever bought
Reviews.Author: william morton
Reviews.Content: finally something that did exactly what it said it could- all of it! Netflix and Google right there at at a touch and plug and play-up and running in 10 minutes

Reviews.Title: Wi-Fi not so good
Reviews.Author: jose l retana
Reviews.Content: Wi-Fi is not as good as my other two smart Vizio TVs, the only reason I got these Philips TV is because media connect.If you don't care about media connect I recommend vizio.Good price.

Reviews.Title: Nice small television
Reviews.Author: Tina Cooke
Reviews.Content: I ordered this television for my teenager daughter's bedroom, which is somewhat small, and it's perfect.  No problems connecting it to our wireless router, it streams YouTube and Netflix videos pretty seamlessly, and it's the perfect size for her room.  She likes it very much and so do I.  Glad I bought it and would recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: nice picture and good sound quality
Reviews.Author: FLF "felixfusco2"
Reviews.Content: no complaints (as yet)As above  -  good sound quality and good picture.  nice size screen for small room, good price

Reviews.Title: very poor network speed
Reviews.Author: Deborah L. Blalock
Reviews.Content: This is definitely NOT what I thought it would be.  I have a brand new Apple router,  and all my other devices have great internet speed, but this TV doesn't pick up the network very easy.  Netflix constantly has to buffer video in order to watch a show.  If it was easy to return (I don't have the box any more) I would definitely get rid of it.

Reviews.Title: mediaconnect
Reviews.Author: David S. Baugher
Reviews.Content: this tv does too have media connect maybe you have to update the software on the tv all I know is I can play music etc right from my pc on the tv, works great

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Emerson
Reviews.Content: It would have been great if the 22 inch had Media Connect.  All in all, it was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: 22" Phillips led Tv
Reviews.Author: Merv
Reviews.Content: greet  pitcher and it was delivering in two days. It was easy to hoke up , and fix to the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Mark S.
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV because it was a good value for the money and it had Wifi.  It was shipped quickly and packaged so that little if any damage could occur.Set up was easy and so was the connection to the home wireless network. We are impressed with the picture and the simplicity of the controls.As it is new, we cant comment on durability and long term quality but will revisit this review after owning for a few months.

Reviews.Title: No bad surprises. Wifi works good
Reviews.Author: Yohan
Reviews.Content: I was worried the wireless connection for the web apps would be slow but it really decent. Good picture and input/output ports.Only issue is how slow it takes for the tv to register a button press. It's like one second lag for each press. To be honest I expected that.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase of 2012 - one of them, anyway!
Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: I give 5 stars because this is a great little TV.  Best feature?  Built-in Wi-Fi with the ability to hop right on netflix.  Actually, the button is built right in on the remote!  I love that when you watch youtube, it automatically full screens everything!  ALL of my children want one of these because they don't get netflix in their rooms.  This one's for mom and dad though.  We haven't had a TV in our room, well, ever.  It has a decent picture and sound for a small TV that was relatively inexpensive.  I would buy this same TV again in a heartbeat.Cons? "typing" things like log-in username and password.  Not so fun, but you stay logged in.  I've only had to do that twice.

Reviews.Title: YESS!!!!
Reviews.Author: J. Fulton
Reviews.Content: I love this television.  It was so quick and easy to set up (15 minutes).  Love the wireless LAN adapter feature, the picture and the sound.  Great value.  Very quick (2 day delivery).

Reviews.Title: Smart TV....review.
Reviews.Author: Judith
Reviews.Content: This TV is for my office.  It was under $200 and works great.  I have watched many movies, mini-series, U Tube, etc. It performs flawlessly, has a good picture etc. I would give it a five, but have only had it a few months so my rating is reserved.

Reviews.Title: Nice Little TV, but way weird to get to talk to your router ...
Reviews.Author: Timothy S. Shropshire "'rangsmith"
Reviews.Content: Nice little TV. Nice picture, decent sound and a small footprint. USB's plug and play just fine. The onboard software could not find our Apple Airport Extreme though at all. Complete failure (and we tried every way possible).Other than that, I can recommend this critter completely
